channel.title: duke nukem forever may be back folks!!!
channel.description:
as i am an duke nukem fan i readed on duke4.net that they fixed the court issue, and may get finshed with the game. and on youtube it is a 2010 trailer of dnf. link to video: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3CwHzclyYnI']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3CwHzclyYnI[/url]
and the voices may be some hints like:
im feeling lucky this christmas. hmmmmm what could that mean :3
so lets hope it will be coming
atleast i do :smiley:

item.title: duke nukem forever may be back folks!!!
item.dc:creator: Deimos
item.description:
pfannkuchen_gesicht:

nah, at the end of HL3 you wake up in a mental institution and gordon freeman is someone insane and anything was just a dream

End of Ep3 you wake up in the train at the start of Half-life 1 and realize you dozed off then have to make the choice to push the thing into the chamber or not

item.title: duke nukem forever may be back folks!!!
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
Bobikan00sh:

i think M. night Shyamalan should take over creating Duke nukem forever.
the twist could be duke nukem becoming relevant again

/thread (third times the charm…i hope)

That guy is a genius, Sixth Sense is one of my favorite movies of all times. Valve should so hire him; at the end of HL3 you learn Gordon Freeman was actually dead the whole time.

Anyway, on topic: Duke Nukem looks like it could be cool. And really I couldn’t care less that it’s been delayed so much, I don’t even know about it until recently after it fell apart so I’ve never gotten my hopes up and I’ve nver bothered waiting, I just go on with my life and pretend it doesn’t exist until it comes out, if ever. I wish I could that with blackmesa.

rorriMAesU:

…they have to start from scratch…

You best be trollin’. Starting from scratch is what got them into this mess in the first place. Scraping all their countless hours of work and money was retarded the first time they did it, it’s not going to be any more retarded if they do it a 50th time.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Magnitus
item.description:
i think duke nukem 3d is an awsome and fun game and i would be happy on a remake of it thanks to eduke32 we can still enjoy the game on our new computers ^^. and about dnf here is and part of an interview with george broussard:
Duke Nukem fan: [Is] DNF cancelled?

George Broussard: Two facts: We haven’t said anything. The [3DR DNF] forum is still open.

but this may also mean that if they can, they willl complete the game hopefully without any more delays

shorter said: they are not sure… :meh:

:mono:

item.title: duke nukem forever may be back folks!!!
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
How much news did you actually hear about duke nukem forever? Not a whole lot, you honestly had to search the net. The general public forgot about duke nukem and certainly dont hate the idea of a duke game. They arent like you; bitter, and following duke for 14 years.

If a new Duke Nukem 3D game is inherently good and fun to play (and marketed well), why would release dates matter? Time only allows for improved technology and memories to fade, allowing for a fresher experience. Look at all the fucking horror movie remakes recently, they make tons of money in the box office. Dont ask me why, they all suck, but you cant argue that duke nukem has no potential and cant be successful. Duke Nukem in 2015.

ummm…/thread?

Read full topic
item.source: duke nukem forever may be back folks!!!

/thread

item.source: duke nukem forever may be back folks!!!

item.title: duke nukem forever may be back folks!!!
item.dc:creator: rorriMAesU
item.description:
Duke Nukem has tons of potential. The problem is that everyone now associates DN in general with the whole duke nukem forever fiasco. In order for any success, i imagine they have to start from scratch. Personally, I would be satisfied with an updated version of the original. Keep the aliens invading earth to capture babes shit, why not, duke nukem isnt some wholesome family game. Who cares why they want them, they are hot and a reason for Duke to kick ass…and chew bubblegum. Yea, I said it…

Honestly, Duke Nukem 3D is an awesome blueprint that just needs updating. Good controls, new graphics, ridiculous alien gore, physics, etc… Keep all the enemies, but add some. Stick to similar environments, just diversify them. His arsenal was always fun and definitely unique. The bosses were epic. All thats needed are some good alien-inspired puzzles in order to rescue the babes, and possibly platforming and jetpack implementation (a lot of people forget he had a jetpack). Youd have a badass duke game.

At least it would be better than some twisted fuck called duke nukem: forever: rehashed a million times edition. I dont know about any of you, but its been at least 10 years since Ive even seen DN3D running on a computer. I barely remember the details. Besides, younger gamers probably dont even know WTF duke nukem 3d is.

I wouldnt mind playing a fun, updated version of it. If done correctly, it would probably sell better than a brand new story anyway. my worthless 2 cents.

Read full topic
